title: Sidewall, 1918–23
inscribed: Printed in left selvedge: "Imp. a. Paris en 1918 par E.ts D.K. pour L'Ater Ruhlmann".
dimensions:
Overall (Object size): 100 x 50 cm (39 3/8 x 19 11/16 in.)
Overall (Support size): 107 x 58.5 cm (42 1/8 x 23 1/16 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisition Endowment Fund
description: Overall pattern of wavy vining foliage, with intermittent bands of flowers or berries. Printed in mauve and yellow ocher on white ground.

exhibitions.title: Looking Forward/ Looking Back: Recent Acquisitions in 20th- and 21st-Century Design

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1918–23.
1918–23. Machine-printed on paper. Museum purchase from General Acquisition Endowment Fund. 2003-9-1.
